name: Sker Ritual
description: The co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

name: Togges
description: Togges is a collect-a-thon 3D Platformer about spreading and stacking adorable cubes around the cosmos! Explore unique worlds, solve mysteries and overcome challenges in this adventure to dominate the universe!

name: Swordship
description: What does a Shoot’Em Up look like if you remove the shooting? It looks like Swordship: an intense dodging game where placement is everything. Sharpen your skills because this is the Dodge'em Up you are looking for!

name: Ultimate Golf!
description: Ultimate Golf! is a multiplayer golf game where you can challenge other players and rivals in real-time tournaments, golf games, real-time duels, golf courses, and our special Golf Royale battle mode!

name: MechNest
description: MechNest is a 3D bullet hell shooter developed by a single person. As you progress through the map, which changes with each challenge, collect reinforcement items and defeat powerful enemies with flashy shooting! Combine your skills freely and rampage through the hive of mechs!

name: Far Cry 6: Collapse
description: For the first time in Far Cry history, you are the villain. Get up close and personal as you take control of the legends themselves: Vaas Montenegro, Pagan Min and Joseph Seed – all played by the original cast. Across three DLC episodes, you will delve into these iconic villain’s twisted minds, uncover their backstories, battle their inner demons, and reunite with familiar faces. All of this in a new Far Cry gameplay experience in which you will have to die… and retry. Can you escape the mind of a villain?

name: Far Cry 6: Control
description: For the first time in Far Cry history, you are the villain. Get up close and personal as you take control of the legends themselves: Vaas Montenegro, Pagan Min and Joseph Seed – all played by the original cast. Across three DLC episodes, you will delve into these iconic villain’s twisted minds, uncover their backstories, battle their inner demons, and reunite with familiar faces. All of this in a new Far Cry gameplay experience in which you will have to die… and retry. Can you escape the mind of a villain?

name: Far Cry 6: Insanity
description: For the first time in Far Cry history, you are the villain. Get up close and personal as you take control of the legends themselves: Vaas Montenegro, Pagan Min and Joseph Seed – all played by the original cast. Across three DLC episodes, you will delve into these iconic villain’s twisted minds, uncover their backstories, battle their inner demons, and reunite with familiar faces. All of this in a new Far Cry gameplay experience in which you will have to die… and retry. Can you escape the mind of a villain?

name: Bowling Buddies
description: A competitive bowling facebook game, with character customization.

name: Temperia: Soul of Majestic
description: Temperia: Soul of Majestic is a competitive card-based board game. Quick, strategic and totally open-handed, every match is different from others thanks to the abilities of the creatures, the equipment, the powers and the elemental spaces presented in the board.

name: Snaketroidvania
description: Help snake bust out!

name: Anything For You
description: While cleaning your dead grandfather's attic, explore the objects there and experience poignant flashbacks of him.

name: The Toroidal Tower
description: Two Donuts on Top of Each other

name: I've Been Busy Being Dead
description: Сontrol a cute ghost, haunt various objects to scare people to death, thus stealing their freedom!

name: Stuck In Paris
description: Can you escape the Place Charles de Gaulle?

name: Bust-a-Loop
description: Sin descripción

name: Witching Morning
description: Sin descripción

name: Plantolution
description: Grow beautiful plants, however you like!

name: So Many Spiders
description: Don't web me bro

name: Lobsterbotomy
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightowl
description: Old friends reunite over a chat room.

name: Andi's Moving Company
description: a game about moving

name: Cervidae
description: Cervidae is an indie adventure game.

name: Roomba Rampage
description: Sin descripción

name: Banira Shio
description: Banira Shio is an arcade flying simulator in which you must deliver love notes from pupil to pupil.

name: Royal Order
description:
Royal Order is a LGBT+ historical fantasy Visual Novel featuring survival stats-raising elements, magic and court intrigue.

Keep the main characters alive through the story by improving their skills. Host social events to gain different factions’ approval. You can also go on campaigns to bring the ongoing war to an end.

This game is an indirect sequel to the Visual Novel "Royal Alchemist". The story takes place in the same world, but follows a different cast. Both games can be played separately from each other.

name: Astrolight
description: Help Astro find the spaceship pieces using your resizing lantern light.

name: Maggie's Grinning Soul
description: Psychic Investigation Vintage Point-and-click

name: Brian's Soccer Simulator
description: A customizable text-based soccer simulator

name: Goal Rush
description: Arcade game local multi-player

name: The Roll Game
description: Simple, addictive and the best ball game ever

name: Baldr Sky "Zero" Extreme
description:
Sold during Winter Comiket 85 (C85), in 2013.

Includes extra scenarios with heroines Sakura, Kei and Francisca.

name: Soccer League
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Football Tactics
description: A turn-based tactical football game

name: Sonder
description: A game about waiting rooms

name: Ask Her
description: A short parser-like game.

name: Lost in the Dance
description: Sometimes finding out who you really are can be a pleasant experience, let's hope this is one of those times.

name: The Tortile Chamber
description: The Tortile Chamber is a game about exploring a strange room.

name: Riot Soccer
description: use left and right pointer buttons, or only touch support for maximum soccerage

name: Moving In
description: A puzzle game about helping your friends move house.

name: Multiplayer Table Football
description: Multiplayer Table Football - Football Flash Game

name: Schoolhouse Note
description: One-room schoolhouse note-passing puzzle

name: Come on Up
description: "Come on up Brad ... my parents are asleep ;)"

name: Maniac Inc.
description: Classic defend the castle game with lots of fun store items and weapons!

name: Forbon FC
description: Manage the failing team, stop their bad luck and lead them to glory!

name: One Room Dungeon
description: Explore a mysterious and exciting dungeon filled with exciting mysteries without ever leaving the same room! Why would you change rooms when clearly this one has all the danger and excitement and danger that one could possibly need?!

name: Fellowship Manager
description: Manage a fellowship and defeat and unstable king, to bring back stability to the lands

name: Foot-Fall!
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Fun Soccer
description: 6 player local multiplayer soccer game

name: Doge Game
description: A fun Doge arcade game where you need to prevent the ball from falling to the ground

name: FrogBall
description: Football with Frogs

name: Bullet Ball
description: Soccer but with guns

name: Goalie
description: How many Goals can you save?

name: Bit Pong
description: A game about a ball and a cup

name: Sokkqer
description: Sport.

name: FootSkull
description: Your speed is your health, headbutt the skull into the goal to score. Can you defeat all dungeon mob teams?

name: One Man Football
description: Real but simple Football Game - Skill yet Fun

name: Utopia: Origin
description: Utopia: Origin is a survival MMORPG where you get to delve deep into a huge fantasy world and do basically whatever you want: fight against monsters, talk to other players, build all kinds of buildings, explore inhospitable areas, and much more.

name: Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence - Collector's Edition
description: Hidden object puzzle game where you help your partner solve a group of murders, possibly even his own.

name: Rhythm Retro
description: With R.P.G. elements, audio calibration settings, an online leaderboard, 7 gold medal achievements, 6 class upgrade ranks, and even keyboard controls for Blue-stack players! This game will work on any mobile device after 2014 with Android OS. You don't even need a touch screen to play! Challenge yourself with 120 unique gameplay combinations! Level up your Retro Boosts and blow the competition away! Creatively unique, and designed to fulfill your enjoyment! Rhythm Retro is the ultimate Tap Rhythm Music Game!

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers
description: Dragon Ball: The Breakers is a 1-on-7 online asymmetrical action game in which a band of seven everyday humans tries to survive the Raider (a classic Dragon Ball rival such as Cell and Frieza) who will hunt and evolve into an unstoppable force.

name: An Outcry
description: A branching-path narrative horror RPG set in Vienna, Austria. Guide the Unnamed through the worst night of their life: Harass your neighbours. Debate with birds. Smoke to survive.

name: Kung Fury: Street Rage - A Day at the Beach
description:
Celebrate the Kung Fury 5-year anniversary with this DLC!
Hasselhoff joins the fight as a new playable hero and you can now team up in the brand new multiplayer game mode!
And pummel your way through a new blazing stage!

Beat nazis all day long, everywhere. become the action! uphold the law!!!

name: Heroes of Xanfurth
description: Travel across Xanfurth in a coming of age JRPG.

name: Super Mario World Randomizer
description: Sin descripción

name: Mystic Tribes
description:
Ancient Creatures Lived Across, From Gigantic Dinos To Spiders With Claws;
Wield Blades & Axes To Win Big Successes, Break Out The Cage Of This Stone Age Madness!

name: Fire Lancer
description:
This is a vertical scrolling shooting game, with many unique selectable characters, and a data progression system.
There are a total of 8 stages, but only 4 stages will be played in one game. There is a course determination feature which players are able to influence.

This game can be played on Wonder Swan flash cart or PC.

name: A=B
description: A=B is a programming puzzle game with only one instruction: A=B, which means replacing A with B.

name: Shattle
description: Shattle is an action-packed PVP, points-based survival game where you shoot, loot and craft your way to shelter as you dodge bombs on the way.

name: Song of Nunu: A League of Legends Story
description:
In this single-player adventure, venture into the idyllic but treacherous world of the Freljord as Nunu, a young boy on a quest to find his lost mother. Unearth the secrets, myths, and legends buried deep in the frozen tundra alongside your best friend, a wise and playful yeti named Willump, and unfold an inspiring story one puzzle at a time.

Developed by Tequila Works, the studio behind RiME, Song of Nunu: A League of Legends StoryTM invites players old and new to experience the League of Legends universe from a fresh lens.

name: Beneath Oresa
description: Beneath Oresa, a fighting roguelike deckbuilder, takes you deep within the city to confront your foes. As a strategist, choose your cards, upgrades, and artifacts wisely, but as a fighter, turn their positioning to your advantage.

name: Isekai Cowboy
description: Dive into the magical land of Isekai Cowboy, a JRPG - inspired by classics such as Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy - where you take over the role of a cowboy, finding himself in a fantastical world. Solve many mysteries, find out why you were brought here and how to escape.

name: Dono's Tale
description: Relive the glory days of the 16 and 32-bit era in Dono's Tale. A super cute and colorful platformer about a hungry little dragon! Jump, dash, climb, and shoot your way through detailed and colorful worlds in order to get back your precious fruit!

name: Sven's SudokuPad
description: Sven's SudokuPad finally lets you play your own Sudoku puzzles in the same app as used by Cracking the Cryptic in their videos. Created by Sven, the same developer who has created and improved the Cracking the Cryptic Sudoku webapp over the past year.

name: Halo Infinite: Season 1 - Heroes of Reach
description: The first season of Halo Infinite's multiplayer ran from November 15, 2021 until May 3, 2022. Many of the customization options available in this season are exclusive for the Mark V(B) armor core, based on Halo: Reach's armor permutations, including armor kits based on NOBLE Team's permutations. The Season also features customization options for the Mark VII armor core and other options for players, such as Death animations.

name: Minigolf Party
description: Minigolf Party was a fully featured minigolf game that allowed you to challenge your Facebook friends to a round of golf, on a selection of themed stages.

name: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout - Season 6
description: Party on! Dive into a carnival of crowns, with an all-new festival-fresh Blunderdome headlined by new rounds, obstacles and bean celebrations galore...

name: Pro Soccer Online
description: Pro Soccer Online is a 1st/3rd person, highly skill based, online multiplayer soccer game. It offers a sports game experience unlike any other with smooth, physics based, input driven gameplay that is competitive and rewarding with no pay to win mechanics.

name: C-Dogs SDL
description:
C-Dogs SDL is an open source port of the original C-Dogs that was released in 1997.

It has many improvements such as 4 player local multiplayer, LAN multiplayer, and more campaigns.

name: Arkfront
description: ARKFRONT is an arcade shooter with beautiful pixel-art graphics, RPG upgrades, and a rogue-lite style progression system reminiscent of FTL. Battle your way across the galaxy in search of a new home for mankind.

name: Doomori
description: Rip, Gun and Tear your way through the Vast-Forest; Otherworld; Black-Space and Faraway, in this fast-pased, hectic doom/omori parody!

name: Nekra Psaria
description: Nekra Psaria is a point and click game about strange dark world called Nekra Psaria.

name: Crazy Planets
description: Crazy Planets is an artillery game that uses Facebook's social networking to recruit more players to your missions.

name: Mario Adventure
description:
This Super Mario Bros. 3 hack changes the game right down to the core by tweaking the actual game engine itself!

Aside from the ‘typical’ graphics and text changes, this hack alters musical melodies, a full line up of all new levels, new power ups, new abilities for Mario, and even new enemies! When I say new, I’m not talking about changed graphics; I’m talking about completely new power ups and monsters. Money mushrooms, invisible Mario, time stopping potions, Kuribo shoes in any level that don’t disappear, shy guys that create projectiles, heat seeking bullet bills, and others are just the beginning of the changes made to this game.

On top of that, you have random weather patterns on every stage, boss battles on every stage, and infinite lives, so your coins go to more useful purposes. They will be used to buy items from Toad’s house and get some level exits to appear. Let’s not forget stored, and switchable, power ups such as those found in Super Mario World!

name: Restaurant City
description: Create, decorate and manage your Restaurant, with your facebook friends as workers!

name: Examination Chambers
description: In this short puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles. Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.

name: Who Has the Biggest Brain?
description: Who Has The Biggest Brain?, was a scoreboard based social game on facebook, with math, memory and spatial minigames.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 3 Reburned
description: Five Nights at Sonic's 3 Reburned (or for short FNaS 3 Reburned) it's a FNAF fangame, which is basically a copy of FNAF 3 but with new story, characters, etc.

name: Socialize
description: Socialize is a multiplayer role-playing game, based on real life. Join a unique community that will fit your vision of roleplaying in this endless living world and write your own story with no limits!

name: See-through Jewels
description: Enjoying a simple, addictive puzzle of rules. Have a happy conversation with various smiley girls!

name: Prepare For Warp: Unlimited Edition - Beyond Insanji
description: Intense and exciting arcade spaceflight through dense fields of asteroids, hostile ships, and other obstacles.

name: Cat Stories: New Year
description: A small interactive hidden objects game about a cat who slept through everything and now has to prepare for the New Year in the shortest possible time while the owner is not at home. Puzzles, mini-games and a festive mood await you.

name: Psychic Cat
description: A journey across a blasted psychosphere. A cat in trouble.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent
description: In the highly anticipated sequel, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent, play as a double agent spy for the first time ever. Take on dual roles of covert operative and ruthless terrorist, where your choices of whom to betray and whom to protect actually affect the outcome of your game. This is the Ubisoft Montreal version, which plays more like the classic Splinter Cell games. The games share the same general plot but feature different storylines, plot twists, and levels. They do however, share the same background music, a few cut scenes and all voice actors.

name: Shakadou-san no Jun'ai Road
description:
Shakadou decides to move temporarily to Shounan, where he "turns out" to survive and to live under the bridge, bathing at the beach shower and feeding by working to the fishermen.
Until one day, when a different girl seems to change the attitude of the yankee looking oji-san.

name: Cube Gravity
description: You are a cube that can control gravity

name: Keep Moving Forward
description: Keep Moving Forward is a small arcade game representing the idea of moving forward instead of getting stuck in the past, no matter what obstacles may come your way.

name: Trainbow
description: TRAINBOW is a mouse-based, maze-action game about collecting bulbs and restoring colour to the world! With a click of your mouse, you can lay down five consecutive tracks for your heroic Manpuck to travel along - and as Manpuck moves faster, so does the world around them.

name: Singular Stone
description: Vocaloid Metroidvania for the MSX2.

name: Cosmos Bit
description: Cosmos Bit is an old school metroidvania that will take you in an extraterrestrial world painted with the legendary Amstrad CPC's colour palette, reworked for modern devices. The game is enjoyable for both veterans and newbies of this genre!

name: PunchMan Online
description: PunchMan is an online game designed for everyone who wants to enjoy their free time doing something funny. Whether you're good or bad at gaming, whether you're a grown adult or child, your gender, your job doesn't matter. All you need to do is punch and punch.

name: Shark Attack: Deep Sea Adventures
description: Shark Attack is a deep-sea, classic 2D adventure game. It comes with an intriguing gameplay, fun character, and an epic boss fight amongst other enemy.

name: Dog Petting Simulator
description: Dog Petting Simulator is a first person indie game that emulates a highly realistic experience of the universal human dream: walking around a park all day and petting some playful pups.

name: Advanced Sorcerian
description: Advanced Sorcerian is an enhanced remake of the classic computer action RPG Sorcerian. It features the original game's scenario along with the Sengoku and Pyramid add-on disk scenarios. Aside from enhanced graphics and fresh character portraits, the remake adds several exclusive scenarios created specifically for this release.

name: Warhall
description: Warhall is a free to play online wargaming simulator for The 9th Age: Fantasy Battles.

name: Megaquarium: Architect's Collection
description: With Megaquarium's second expansion, the Architect's Collection in your arsenal, you'll be equipped to take your aquarium design skills to new heights! Build bridges above existing thoroughfares and lay tunnels underneath your tanks! These paradigm-shifting tools will help you realize your creations like never before. The Architect's Collection is a celebration of the spaces outside the tanks. With this in mind it comes fully equipped with a new gift shop toy - the adorable Hermit Crab - as well as two customer-focused accessories.

name: Pokémon Community Game
description: The Pokémon Community Game is a free to play extension for Twitch. Streamers who add this extension to their stream can have their chat catch, trade, and battle their favorite Pokémon.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy - Vol. 1
description: This is a single-player battle action game that challenges you with appealing characters and original story missions while maintaining the same control feel of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2! This product is Vol. 1 (Episodes 1-5) of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation Code Fairy.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy - Vol. 2
description: This is a single-player battle action game that challenges you with appealing characters and original story missions while maintaining the same control feel of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2! This product is Vol. 2 (Episodes 6-10) of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation Code Fairy.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy - Vol. 3
description: This is a single-player battle action game that challenges you with appealing characters and original story missions while maintaining the same control feel of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation 2! This product is Vol. 3 (Episodes 11-15) of Mobile Suit Gundam Battle Operation Code Fairy.

name: Gone Rogue
description: Get into the role of a thief from the city slums. Your weapons are your dexterous fingers, your skills are your cunning, attentiveness and planning, your motivation is silent disobedience to the will of the ruling party. Lurking in the shadows, slip unnoticed past enemies, get behind any locked doors, and carry off rich loot. But it's not just money and valuables you're after. In this harsh and unjust world, many need help, and it is in your power to help them.

name: Pac-Man Museum+
description: A compilation of 14 Pac-Man titles. Players can earn coins by playing the games to purchase items to decorate an in-game arcade.

name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami: Getting Help With Patchouli Knowledge
description: You decide to seek out someone who's been looking for you, that person is none other than Patchouli Knowledge! She seems to have a surprise prepared, but what could it be?

name: Cupid Nonogram
description: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Sweet Dance
description: Sweet Dance is a free mobile rhythm game. This game has a fashion, crew, elf, marriage/baby system, and etc. It has some of the latest songs from around the world that you and others can dance to.

name: Bad Ben
description:
Experience the first Found Footage Video Game that isn’t about Slender Man (citation needed)! Based on the cult hit micro-micro-micro-budget film series, the Bad Ben game is here to take the beloved franchise digital. Take the role of Tom Riley—voiced by the man himself, Nigel Bach—as he once again makes the incredibly informed decision to buy a house sight unseen at a sheriff’s auction.

Obviously, the night does not go by un-ghosted. Soon after his arrival, paranormal happenings begin to plague the unflappable Tom. You’ll have to get to the bottom of these spectral shenanigans, mostly by finding keys. Because it’s an indie horror game.

Do you have what it takes to survive the night?

name: Dreadful Tales: The Space Between - Collector's Edition
description: The Spencers picked up an abandoned country estate for cheap, hoping to flip it and turn a profit, but when they come to check out the property, they discover it has dark secrets hidden inside its walls. A creature begins to terrorize them, rifling through their things, smashing furniture and causing a ruckus, but soon their annoyance turns into terror. Can they escape something that lives within the very walls themselves? Find out in this terrifying hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Project Condor
description: Remedy’s Project Condor is a multiplayer spinoff of Control.

name: Overcooked! All You Can Eat: The Ever Peckish Rises
description: This freshly baked adventure brings seven brand new spooky kitchens and adds three chefs to the roster: The adorable Axolotl Chef, our less-than-fresh Unbread Chef, and the original omnivorous Overlord, Everpeckish Chef.

name: Overcooked! All You Can Eat: The Overcooked Birthday Party
description: Five new birthday themed levels, the new Tabby Cat chef, a recipe to make a cup of tea, and in-game Switcheroo mechanic where living playing cards stalk the levels transporting players across the kitchen, are all on the menu.

name: Operation: Tango - Challenge Mode
description: Operation: Tango launches into action with brand new free DLC for all players! Put your communication skills to the ultimate test in our new Challenge Mode!

name: Peter Talisman: Lord of the Harvest
description: An insatiable desire to dance inexplicably takes reign over a peasant farmland which Peter Talisman finds himself determined to find the source of. Harvest a seemingly endless amount of corn to clear the field to discover new characters, hidden artifacts, and steps to unravel the mystery of the dancing bug.

name: The French and Indian War
description: The First World War? The French and Indian War was the North American part of a much larger war raging in the mid-Eighteenth Century called the Seven Years War. The Empires of Britain and France were struggling for control of multiple areas around the world. In North America, that struggle raged for 5 years in actions ranging from isolated skirmishes to full scale invasions. Quebec would be the primary prize for the armies and its fall would mean the almost guaranteed defeat of New France.

name: Super Metroid: Ancient Chozo
description:
Ancient Chozo is an expansion of the original Game
that contains the original Super Metroid Map layout with
extra largest new rooms and areas locations, plus new routes to find.

Ancient Chozo started from Project Base Hack, but it's not the same,
it has new color palette for the entire game, and even more places to explore plus
new custom enemies, moves, puzzles, music, and some few more stuff
The new routes makes the game more interesting and more fun to explore.
My intention was to keep the original route of Vanilla and add some new routes that can curious players could find,
and also the players with good skills can break the Game Sequence.
The gameplay now rewards both types of players,
those who likes going faster, can now beat the game faster than cause they have new shortcuts and new routes to travel between each area much faster!
On the other hand, those who like exploring or breaking the game sequence, now gets most of the upgrades and power ups! Although it's a task not to easy to perform!

Chozo Hack focused on Explorations and most of the original items locations has been changed!
There's a lot of new secrets to discover, new areas, new rooms and no longer have the help of the X-Ray vision, but there's a new feature find them, so the players can feel curious finding new secrets and upgrades using a different method, so that makes the adventure even more interesting and enjoyable.
I've have added more rooms and more areas also new gfx and I'll be adding some more in future versions.

name: Campaign Antietam
description: Many battles preceded and followed, but none would be so costly on both sides as Antietam. No more would citizen soldiers populate both armies. Rather, they would now be known as professional veterans. For the Confederacy, the brilliance of Robert E. Lee would be needed to keep the southern army alive. Opposing him, a series of union generals would be tried. Many would fail. In the end, George McClellan would be called upon, a second time, to save the Union. Will he succeed, or will Lee lead southern armies to victory?

name: Campaign Gettysburg
description: It is the crossroad of the War between the States. July 1, 1863, dawns hot and bright in southeastern Pennsylvania. General Lee had slipped behind the Union Armies, which were moving south to engage them in what many believed, then and now, to be the climactic battle of the American Civil War.

name: Indie Rumble
description: Indie Rumble is an indie crossover platform fighting game, featuring a cast of some of indie gaming's biggest icons. Indie icons clash when you duke it out with up to eight players, both locally and online.

name: ARD: Anomalous Research Department
description:
In the basement of a local community college, a forgotten computer sits.

The last relic of the Anomalous Research Department.

What was their purpose? What did they find?

Was it the solution? Or was it the cause?

name: Sword of Elpisia
description: On Terra, a world whose civilization developed thanks to magic tools, there are frequent cases of people being turned into magic swords. Alice, a girl who is traveling with Aldo, the main character, chooses to become a sword to rescue her friends. Will their journey and encounters lead them to a predetermined fate? Throw yourself into the beautiful, complex turn-based battles, using magic swords with up to three weapons set! The overwhelming charm of pixelated graphics surround your entire world and adventure in a unique fantasy JRPG. Not to mention all the necessary elements from treasure hunting, quests, pet buddies to almost-infinite level caps!

name: Arcticmind
description: You wake up in an abandoned hospital, not knowing what has happened to you or where you are. soon noticing that you are not alone and must find out what happened to you and the world while trying to survive that nightmare..

name: Sinsations
description: In Sinsations, a BL / Yaoi Visual Novel, you play as Kosuke, Lucifer's newest Deadly Sin of Lust. Kosuke has to seduce all 6 of the other Deadly Sins to prove to Lucifer he's up to the challenge! Numerous ends, hundreds of backgrounds and CGs, and full voice acting!

name: Smelogs Playground
description: Smelogs Playground is a Free-to-Play Real-Time Strategy game with charming aesthetics and a simple but effective gameplay mechanism. Take over the playful and rocky Smelogs to compete against each other for fun and honor!

name: Lord Ambermaze
description: This world and all life in it have stopped. Only your steps can force the flow of time to move. In this adventure, time is your best ally and your enemy. You need to restore the flow of time - and for that purpose, you'll have to delve into the depths of the underworld and challenge the evil Lord.

name: Napoleonic Battles: The Final Struggle
description: This intro to the Napoleonic Battles series is a snippet of the content covered in Campaign Waterloo.This content represents some good focused actions allowing players to get into the meat of the combat model of the game engine. While it covers that nicely it does not do the "scope" of one of our titles justice.

name: Squad Battles: Grenada
description: Operation Urgent Fury opened on October 25th, 1983. The United States, heeding the request of the Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States, chose to intervene to both restore order, but also to stymie the growing influence of the Cubans in the Caribbean. This demo game is intended to showcase many of the attributes of the Squad Battles system.

name: Recursor
description: An action roguelite inspired by platform fighters

name: Lyre
description: Lyre is a romance furry visual novel story where you travel to a strange kingdom as a human ambassador, surrounded by diverse characters. Your only weakness is that you have no idea what their motives are. They're all deceiving each other and every one of them is better at it than you. You find yourself only able to trust the most unlikely individual as a terrible plot unfolds around you.

name: Dragon Kingdom
description: Do you want to farm and have an easy life, attempt to go down in the mines to collect resources, or spend your time fishing by the river? With this game you can do all three, while also having a dragon! Take your time discovering what this game has to offer, and immerse yourself in this adventure!

name: MultiVersus
description: MultiVersus is a free-to-play platform fighter that brings the depth of iconic WB stars to life across the nearly endless possibilities of play.

name: Wheel of Fortune: Featuring Vanna White
description: The all-new edition of Wheel of Fortune features Vanna White, the most popular game-show hostess ever and includes over 2,000 all-new Questions. New and enhanced graphics along with improved game play bring you the most exciting version ever of America's favorite game show. Play against the computer, or against up to three friends. Spin the Wheel, buy a vowel, or attempt to solve the puzzle, only Vanna knows what lies behind the tiles. Watching your favorite game show is fun, but with GameTek's WHEEL OF FORTUNE, you don't just watch it, you live it!

name: Haunted Hotel: Silent Waters
description: Can you uncover the hotel's secrets and escape before it's too late? Find out in this gripping hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Haunted Hotel: The Thirteenth
description: Search the mysterious hotel, uncover the secrets of the Bakers family, explore the rooms and save your son Matthew. Remember, that any hotel can keep more secrets, than you can imagine.

name: Haunted Hotel: Personal Nightmare
description: After 20 years, you receive a letter about your missing mom and sister. Answers are waiting at the Freedom Hotel. Find them out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Rusted Moss
description: Traverse the perilous lands of a dying world in this bullet-hell inspired metroidvania! Strong enemies emerge from distant lands as the iron inventions of men succumb to the decay of rust and time. Use a trusty grappling hook and uncover new powers to battle monstrous machines, powerful witches, and explore a new emerging world.

name: Hatchwell
description: Hatchwell is a top-down action RPG set in a day in this slowly changing town! Everyone is preparing for the Hatchwell Festival, but a series of curious events will make you help the Mayor investigate these unwanted occurrences.

name: Kaby Arena
description: Kaby Arena is a tactical multiplayer role playing game which combines free-to-play and play-to-earn to provide an open economy for every player.

name: Ztar Attack 0.5: Mario Escape from the Jail
description: Mario has been arrested for a crime he didn't commit! Can you break out, and uncover a conspiracy along the way?

name: Ztar Attack 2: A Blast to the Past
description: A linear Super Mario 64 hack, Bowser has destroyed the seal that protects the Kingdom from the Ztars and kidnapped the Princess! Mario must collect the Time Stars to fix the seal, and save the day.

name: Setr's Auto Battler
description: A chill online fantasy auto battler

name: The Lost Wild
description: A survival horror adventure about overcoming nature’s most formidable forms of life. Explore overgrown research facilities nestled in a lush wilderness. Be resourceful, intimidate, evade, and unravel the mystery at the heart of the island.

name: Auto Puzzle Defense
description: Real-time Battle with Auto Puzzle. Original take to the classic merge tower defense genre.

name: The Riddle of Blossom Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Swigridova kletba
description: Swigridova kletba (Swigrid's Curse) is a fairy-tale adventure. It is one of the first Czech games that features voice acting, provided by the developer team members themselves. The game is entirely controlled with the mouse through a single action. The gameplay is based on exploring the environment, talking to characters, and solving puzzles. Items can be collected and they are stored in an inventory near the bottom of the screen.

name: Pirates of Gravitae
description:
Pirates of Gravitae is an action roguelike game with fast-paced aerial dogfights, set in a fictional version of the Golden Age of Piracy.

The player commands a rocket propelled pirate ship that they can equip with various weapons and abilities, as they fight against a variety of enemies. They can choose from a selection of different bonuses at the end of every battle, to customize their ship as they go. These bonuses expire at the end of a run. They can also unlock new abilities or upgrade crew members, for perks that persist between runs.

name: Bounce On 2: Drallo's Demise
description:
Roll your way through the Floating Ruins, explore space on the Orbital Platform, and finish the fight in Drallo's Fortress. Customize your character, find hidden secrets, fight against unique bosses and collect gems! With different level objectives to select, and over 100 keys to collect, Bounce On 2: Drallo's Demise will keep you playing and playing!

Fans of the original will love the improvements, and newcomers to the series will have no problem jumping right in. Bounce On 2 features incredible 2D/3D graphics, amazing lighting effects, and is packed with beautiful artwork and 21 unique musical tracks to add to the fun. Use the accelerometer or touch controls. The graphics scale to utilize the capabilities of newer devices.

Bounce On 2: Drallo's Demise is suitable for all ages and skill levels. With level difficulties ranging from super easy to near impossible, Bounce On 2 has something for everyone.

name: Cowardly Heroes
description:
An Alien invasion has arrived and these heroes are doing what they do best: running! Help them dodge and avoid the many incoming obstacles and enemies in this offline arcade game.

Start a fun and challenging run. Collect coins to increase your score and unlock new heroes and bonuses, grab random risky powerups, dodge and overcome enemies, and progress to new challenging levels!

Deadly lasers, threatening skeletons, angry minotaurs, fragile barrels, and many more creative obstacles are waiting to ruin your high score!

name: Idle Superpowers
description: Idle Superpowers is a roguelike idle rpg where you are a superhero who can get multiple superpowers that are combinable and synergize with each other! - Many superpowers to unlock - procedural generation - combine and synergize superpowers - challenges which require different playstyles

name: Rugby 22
description:
Take control of the biggest clubs and top rugby nations, and enter the most prestigious competitions in single-player and multiplayer modes, local and online.

Rugby 22 offers total rugby, combining tactics and intensity through gameplay that stays true to the sport.

name: I Became Gay from Translating My New Roommate's Short Story
description:
An anti-work antifiction yuri ADV.

A mediocre translator burned out by capitalism.

A writer who has only been published once in her entire life.

They meet as roommates and develop a relationship that is perhaps much more than love.

name: Violation
description: Violation is a First Person Horror Game that takes Place in many other Worlds.

name: Fight N' Fall
description: Fight N' Fall is a top-down hero brawler where you can destroy the environment to make your enemies fall onto their demise. The game has several heroes to choose from and a wide array of colorful arenas to destroy!

name: League of Light: The Gatherer
description: League of Light: The Gatherer is the fourth title in the League of Light series. Can you and your little scarecrow friend track down the imposter and uncover his devious plans? Find out in this spooky hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: League of Light: The Gatherer - Collector's Edition
description: League of Light: The Gatherer is the fourth title in the League of Light series. Can you and your little scarecrow friend track down the imposter and uncover his devious plans? Find out in this spooky hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Arcade Galaxy
description: Arcade Galaxy is a game made in 2D-hand-drawn graphics, which is a space arcade in a retro style. In it you have to shoot hundreds of different types of enemy ships, collect various bonuses, dodge bullets, and also make sure that your combat arsenal does not end.

name: Hotel City
description: Hotel City was a Facebook game about building and decorating your very own hotel.

name: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience
description: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience is a ROM hack which is a recreation of the Spaceworld '97 demonstration version of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. The creators used as source material information recorded footage and pictures of the event, information found in the Gigaleak and hidden assets found on a F-Zero X overdump cartridge.

name: East
description: Sin descripción

name: Herios
description: Herios is an online collectible card game. It will be available on Steam for Windows/Mac and in a second time on Android and Ios. The game is turn-based, single or multiplayer, and is based on the folklore of the Toria universe through its card's illustrations as well as with the atmosphere of its medieval tavern.

name: Rinne
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat Blade: Dash Dance
description: Beat Blade is an exciting music runner game that offers stunning neon levels and 2021 hit songs.

name: Operius
description:
Operius is a high-speed arcade-inspired shooter where you go through an infinite amount of levels and try to get the highest score!

This game was made specifically for the Opera GX Game Jam by Mors, featuring music and sounds from Catonator. The game ended up winning the jam, so if you have Opera GX installed you can find this game on the browser's no internet page!

name: My Empire
description: My Empire was a city building facebook game, with an ancient Greco-Roman theme.

name: Hello, World!
description: A humanoid walking simulator.

name: Feral Flowers
description: Feral Flowers is a quick-fire roguelite platformer for hay fever haters: dodge the pollen, beat the flowers! Rather than a traditional health meter, the game's timer needs to be topped up by killing enemies. The player can tank any number of hits - unless the timer reaches zero, in which case bullet hell ensues, and a single hit will send them all the way back to the first stage.

name: Pathways
description: Pathways puts you in the shoes of a curious young boy looking for adventure. It's up to you to navigate through challenging and brain stimulating pathways in order to find your missing friend! Seventy-five addicting levels, each progressively harder than the last, will leave you scratching your head as you make your way towards the climactic ending. Along with a host of puzzles, the original soundtrack and appealing art style will keep you grooving as you travel through deep dark dungeons filled with new adventure and mystery around every corner.

name: Hidden Treasures in the Forest of Dreams
description:
Hidden Treasures in the Forest of Dreams is a casual procedural exploration game.
Each level (dream) consists of a procedurally generated 1/2 mile square terrain with items (treasures) dispersed semi-randomly.
The player must find a certain amount of treasures by exploring the dream without a predefined path or map. Some assistance is available in the form of Signs that indicate the general direction of a Treasure.
New treasure categories become available as the player completes dreams. Categories include: Mushrooms, Animals, Creatures, Dark Creatures, Monuments, Boats, etc.

name: 2 in 1 Pack: Super Bubsy/Lollypop
description: This 2 in 1 Pack contains Super Bubsy and Lollypop.

name: Radioapan: Banankalas!
description:
"Radioapans banankalas" is a game for children from Barnradion, Sveriges Radio (the children radio, Swedens Radio).

Radioapan (the Radio Monkey) is Barnradion's blue mascot. He lives in a house tree in Sagoskogen (Fairytale Forest), and loves radio and sounds.

name: Dizzy Bee 2
description:
Dizzy Bee 2 perfects Dizzy Bee's controls and adds difficulty modes for a wider audience. Dizzy Bee 2 is a must for Dizzy Bee lovers; but if you've waited this long, Dizzy Bee 2 is the place to begin.

Dizzy Bee is back in an all-new adventure. Meet baddies like you've never seen that will literally eat you up and spit you out! Can you help your Fruit Friends make their way through grinding gears, around sticky webs and past wild turrets?

There are twice as many Fruit Friends as before for you to guide and protect. This time there are power ups to help you get back at those baddies!

2 Oceans, 8 islands plus 2 bonus islands, 2 difficulty levels, 8 Fruit Friends, power ups and a ton of baddies will keep you tilting and turning your iPhone or iPod Touch for hours!

name: Brunilda
description: Brunilda is a text adventure game.

name: Zero Sievert
description: Zero Sievert is a tense top-down shooter that challenges you to scavenge a procedurally-generated wasteland, loot gear, and explore what’s left of a devastated world. When the odds are stacked against you, you’ll need to do more than just survive...

name: Waka-sama no Zasuru Sekai
description: Ryouga inherits his late grandfather's Shinto shrine, having nowhere else to go and no relatives left to stay with. There, he accidentally summons and unseals a goddess which nearly eats him alive. Fortunately, he is able to get out of it by offering to cook and buy said goddess Waka-sama all the delicious food that the little money he earns from his part-time job can buy. Brimming with curiousity, Waka-sama ventures out into modern Japan with Ryouga, looking for her sister and discovering new foods, sights, spirits, monsters, and gods all the while.

name: Dezaemon DD
description: Dezaemon DD is an unreleased expansion for Dezaemon 3D, developed for the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive.

name: Sinfeld Remastered
description: A comedy-horror parody game inspired by various sitcoms and movies

name: MegaCryptoPolis
description: A decentralized city builder & strategy blockchain game where every asset and material produced in-game by players is an NFT. Build and manage a supply chain to produce simple and complex materials which can be sold to other players or swapped for $MEGA tokens. MegaCryptoPolis is the play to earn player-driven microeconomy layer of the upcoming decentralized Mega World metaverse

name: 64 Wars
description: 64 Wars is an unreleased installment in Nintendo's Wars series planned for the Nintendo 64.

name: Deltatraveler
description: A Deltarune fangame. Kris and Susie suddenly wake up on a flower bed in the world of Undertale. They, along with Noelle, must travel between different worlds to make their way back home.

name: Maple County
description:
Maple County is a very creepy little horror game where you watch a police training VHS tape about dealing with an unknown threat.

Drawing inspiration from the Mandela Catalog YouTube videos, Maple County is a short and very unsettling horror game where you watch and interact with a creepy old interactive police training VHS. While watching the video you’ll need to follow the instructions and absolutely nothing weird will happen whatsoever (if you can spot the lie in that sentence then you’ll make a great cop).

name: Train Crew
description: A train driving simulation game created by Japanese developer Mizotsuki Rail.

name: Tactical Manager 2
description:
Tactical Manager 2 is a soccer/football manager game for Windows.

This sequel goes much further than the predecessor, including a massive database with 30 championships with 60 leagues, with over 32000 players.

The game runs from a regular Windows interface, and all options can be selected with the mouse or the keyboard. Game options include the usual tactical selection, sending the player to train weaker parts of their game or send them to recovery.

name: Dubium
description: Dubium is a five-player social deduction game set in a near-future sci-fi universe. Players take on the role of Frontier or Traitor and must escape from an abandoned space station by any means necessary. Everyone wants to get out alive. Trust no one

name: Destiny's Plan
description: Finn is the protagonist of this story, by a ridiculous coincidence, gets to the hospital, but contrary to fate - rejoicing in this, begins to live in a new way. And falling in love with his new friend, unfortunately, cannot remember one important thing. Will you understand what you have forgotten?

name: Cat of Khronos
description: Use four-dimensional space-time thinking and time travel ability to eat the fish within the specified time and return to the original position, while avoiding the guards' pursuit.

name: Laserboy
description: Help Laserboy escape The Scientist's experimental vision facility without racking up a massive bill. 13 levels of mayhem and confusion in glorious CRT vision.

name: Bogdanoff vs. Wojak Simulator
description: Ever wanted to manipulate the world financial markets? Well now you can! Fight against the Wojaks of the world as you manipulate the world markets and destroy their savings. Carefully pick the correct stock and then choose whether to "Bompeet" or "Dompeet"

name: Fate Seeker II
description: Following the previous one, “Fate Seeker II” character development, thinking and exploration and other elements. You can experience real-time combat without switching scenes, and feel the delightful martial arts anytime.

name: Midnight Mahjong
description: Somewhere in Tokyo, in an exclusive mahjong Club. Rei is a clerk in this club. Her job is to play Mahjong with the guests. Players will operate Rei and play with 3 guests in the authentic Japanese Mahjong. Dead wall draw and Last tile from the wall... It all depends on your skills!!

name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Forbidden Crypt
description: Mia Faircroft goes to Italy! Tag along on her travels in this Hidden Object game. Search through gorgeously rendered locations, breathe new life into a collection of antiques, and discover the secret that lies in the crypt of Porto Nacosti!

name: B-17 Flying Fortress: World War II Bombers in Action
description: The 1992 Classic. Experience the thrill of commanding a B-17 Flying Fortress on perilous missions during a World War II campaign. Study the briefing, choose your men, fly to the target and take control of crew members’ positions from pilot to bombardier. How well will you fare, captain?

name: Undemon
description: Go on a mysterious adventure as a virgin ghost. Various stages that stimulate a sense of challenge are waiting for the virgin ghost Luna. If you want to feel the genre of 2D platformer in the 90s, try it!

name: Robot88
description: Robot88 is a robot tournament, an epic battle with unlimited punches and movements that the player creates.

name: Search All: Steampunk
description: is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the bolts and screws on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"

name: Jo-Jo Fighter
description: Jo-Jo Fighter is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. You are a loner fighter who was thrown into the jungle. Defeat pirates, smugglers and bandits, get out of the dangerous jungle alive!

name: Duck Simulator 2
description: A genre-switching phenomenon that will take you on a journey to stop a rubber duck from taking over the developer's game!

name: Jumper
description: You kidnapped by an A.I. and you don't know where you are. You are a BEAN! You need to do parkour or else you die and respawn. You might get trolled a lot so watch out! The only way out is by doing all levels. More Levels Coming Soon!

name: Patriots: Back to Civilization
description: Patriots: Back to Civilization - Side Scroller tractor control game in physical space, where any tilt and speed can flip your tractor and end the game. Dodging sticks flying by, jumping over gates and other obstacles, you need to keep your balance and drive forward.

name: Eternal Starshine
description: In a space adventure thriller with elements of a first-person detective, you, as a member of the crew of a spaceship, must put an end to the tyranny of the captain of a starship. Act quickly, because someone has set off an explosion and there is little time left!

name: Somewhere in a Clay Nowhere
description: An exploration-based language decoding game made out of clay!

name: Headache
description: 頭痛【資料館編】 行方不明者を探しに資料館へ... 廃墟の資料館に隠された謎を解く一人称視点の探索系国産ホラーゲームです。

name: Neden
description: (3D parkour game from the perspective of 3rd person) struggle to beat the devil's games.

name: Anivenge
description: An arcade style game where you play as an animal hopping around a road trying to crash cars. Work your way through different levels or play in survival mode - how many can you crash before you're run over?

name: Tactical Manager
description:
Tactical Manager is a soccer/football management game, setting you in charge of one of the teams in the top 2 English divisions of the time and giving you control over transfers, tactics and training regimes as you aim to guide your team to success.
Initially you can only manage the lower teams, but if you succeed over a few seasons you will become respected enough to have a chance to get the top roles.

name: Tactical Manager Italia
description: Tactical Manager Italia is an updated version of Tactical Manager. The major change is that the player now works in the Italian instead of the UK soccer league; along with the necessary rule adjustments. There are also some graphical improvements.

name: Tactical Manager 3
description:
Tactical Manager 3 is a football/soccer management game that puts the player in charge of a professional club chosen from the approximately 1200 clubs available in the 68 divisions that are supported.

As a manager, the player can buy and sell players from the 30,000 in the game database, choose a line-up, and pick tactics. All matches are played in turn and during the ones involving their team, the player is able to intervene, make substitutions, inspect performance, mark players, etc. If their rating is good enough, they can also be in charge of a national team for the World Cup.

A total of twelve sessions can be played in parallel. The game can also be played online against other players.

name: Men of War II
description: Experience warfare like never before! Men of War II, the anticipated sequel to the acclaimed RTS franchise is here with all-new units, locations, campaigns and game modes, combined with the series’ trademark historical accuracy and action-filled gameplay on Eastern and Western Fronts of WWII.

name: Pirates Ahoy!
description: Pirates Ahoy! was a social facebook game that let you build your island, recruit your friends as crew members and sail for adventures.

name: Korsakovia
description: Korsakovia is a single-player mod for Valve's video game Half-Life 2. It was developed by The Chinese Room. Korsakovia was released as freeware download on 20 September 2009.

name: System Purge
description: ﻿Trapped in a buried, forgotten facility, you must reach the core of an ancient machine to rescue your lost lover. System Purge is a challenging, atmospheric 2D platformer.

name: Snake Force
description: Snake Force is an alternative top-down shooting game inspired by the classic game Snake.

name: Getting It Up
description: An open world action / comedy variety game with a unique blend of 2D and 3D game modes. With Multi-player PvE, open world racing, combat based 2D platforming and tons of quirky humor.

name: TKKG: Alarm in der Geisterbahn
description:
With their annual pass, Tim, Karl, Dumpling and Gaby have already been to the amusement park "Snappyland" countless times. It was almost getting boring! But when they overhear a conversation between 2 entertainers who are planning a crime, they get into an exciting case. The "goose man", they hear, is to have a "fatal accident" on the same day! Time is running out. Stress at the amusement park!

Take on the roles of Tim, Karl, Dumpling and Gaby. Interview witnesses, look for clues and evidence ...

name: Evering
description:
Evering is an adventure RPG with a turn-based combat system and pixel art style that tells an epic story through witty and funny dialogues with charismatic characters in a completely unique and very detailed world where time loops around in circles.

This is an era of peace and the world faces no danger but if this legend turns out to be true... our days could be numbered.

Evering is a love letter to nostalgia, a tribute to the games we grew up with, with a renewed look and feel, with no random encounters and accessibility options. You don’t want to fight? That’s okay, you can escape every combat with no punishment so you can follow the story at your pace.

The world of Evering is full of treasures, maestros and crystals to learn new skills and alchemy ingredients. There are secrets hidden in the last place you would imagine. Can you find them all?

name: Haunted Hotel: Death Sentence
description: Hidden object puzzle game where you help your partner solve a group of murders, possibly even his own.

name: Haunted Hotel: Lost Dreams
description: Can you unravel the secrets of that mysterious place that is somehow connected to your memories and save your wife?

name: Kimagure Temptation
description: Mysterious murders. A cursed apartment building. Cohabitating with a cute demon girl?! All in a day's work for diviner, Haruhisa but will he be able to solve the case and not be distracted by a demon girl only interested in him?

name: Space Lords
description: Space Lords is a video game released in arcades by Atari Games in 1992. It is a first-person perspective space combat video game which allows the player to fly in any direction.

name: Meikyu Wakusei des Paraiso
description: RPG like Wizardry in 3D Dungeon. Many of the characters are maids. This game can be run on a PC, Windows OS.

name: Game Grumps: Joint Justice - Turnabout Hour
description:
Meet your favorite YouTube duo in an intense
Ace Attorney-like game! Someone stole the 10
Minute Power Hour dinos, and only Arin & Dan
can figure out the culprit of this heinous crime
and save their friend Jory!

name: The Netrunner Awaken1ng
description:
A fast paced 3D plateform-parkour game in procedurally generated levels in which the player hacks the Matrix by collecting all the Datas in time and going as far as possible before being caught by the Logout().

By running and jumping from walls to walls as fast as possible, you will discover, learn and by-pass each new database defenses you will encounter throughout the levels.
Or die, repeat, improve and succeed!

Unlock each level by hacking its password using clues from previous levels!

name: Throwing Punches
description: Throwing Punches is a boxing game where you can punch your opponents from a distance. Throw your punches and control them in flight while dodging enemy attacks. It can be a real workout! You can slow down time if the situation gets out of control.

name: The Wheel of Fortune
description: The only visual novel dating sim with turbo-folk music playing in the background.

name: Pro Basketball Manager 2022
description:
Have you ever dreamt of replaying the last possession during the playoffs’ finals? Which player should have taken that last shot? With Pro Basketball Manager 2022 you become the coach of your favorite team and will be able to change history.

With more than 160 playable competitions - including 25 international competitions, 11 continental competitions, 12 female competitions, over 40 national cups - spread across 55 countries, you will never run out of new opportunities, each team will face different challenges depending on their league, budget or history.
All teams include updated rosters for the 2021-2022 season.

For the first time Pro Basketball Manager also features 2 licensed leagues with official names, logos and photos.

Through your journey to the hall of fame, you must not only recruit and train your players, but also take part in live games, giving on-court instructions or scouting to find the stars of tomorrow. Ensure the stability of your team by managing the day-to-day operations such as club finances, staff management or improving your arena.

Will you lead your team to glory or lead yourself to unemployment? It all depends on you with Pro Basketball Manager 2022. Get it now to enjoy the most realistic basketball management game ever made.

name: Haunted Hotel: Beyond the Page
description: A prolific horror writer invites you to a desolate hotel for an interview where you start to see impossible things, monstrous things.

name: Haunted Hotel: A Past Redeemed
description: Your cousin goes missing and ghosts start taking over your wedding venue! Can you defeat an old adversary and change the course of fate before it’s too late?

name: Defender II
description:
Defender II, the ultimate tower defense is coming with many new features!
Waves of monsters are attacking your castle. They move fast, strike hard, and never give up. However, Defender is more powerful than ever before! What's more, Lava moat, Magic Towers will fight together with Defender!

name: Invasion Versus
description:
Invasion Versus is a fast-paced asymmetric action game that pits two players against each other. One is a mobile Earth turret pointing heavenward, shooting enemies out of the sky. The other is a fleet of invaders who slowly descend to Earth.

Earth wins if all alien invaders are destroyed. The invaders win if all turrets are destroyed or they pass the defense line.

name: Neptunia: Sisters vs. Sisters
description:
The "sisters" get their long-awaited star role in this genuine Neptunia series spin-off!

The four younger sisters rise up to take back their share of the portable games market stolen by the mysterious smartphone called "MagiPhone." The character models that decorate game scenes are all-new, and the characters are cuter than ever!

In addition to a battle system that combines action and strategy, the familiar "Goddess Transformations" and "EXE Drive" systems return, allowing players to enjoy dynamic battles. Utilize strategy to seize victory with the sisters!

name: Error#54
description: Error#54 - first person indie horror game in P.T style, developed by only one person during two months.

name: Zombie Island
description:
You are in a Gameshow and must survive.
The only way to survive is to earn your respect to the spectators.
More Spectators means more Money.
More Money means better Weapons and more Famous!

name: Blupimania 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Blupi
description: Sin descripción

name: Komorebi
description: Komorebi is a coming-of-age/slice of life story about a group of friends who happen to experience visions of their future; and the fears and anxieties they face as they try to find their own way in a life that may be predestined. From Klace, critically acclaimed creator of Winds of Change.

name: Post Trauma
description: Post Trauma is a game that takes inspiration from classic horror games. Play as Roman, a 57 year old man who has awakened in a strange and hostile place and find a way back home with his family. Get inside this world through fixed camera angles, alternating the gameplay with some sections in first person view. Solve puzzles and riddles with the information you will gather exploring your surroundings. Avoid (or kill) the creatures that you will find along the way, but be careful because some of them might not be hostile.

name: Space Hoarders Inc.
description:
A Sci-Fi turn based resource management game.
Mine, craft and ship resources across the galaxy!

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Yuletide Story
description: This is the second game from the Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story. It is a story that happens at Yule and is a story of magic, mystery and evil fairies. A story to get you into the festive spirit.

name: // Overdrive
Veiled Experts
description: Free-to-Play 5v5 tactical shooter where agent's unique Lepton skills meet action- packed gun mechanics. Available on Steam!

name: TKKG: Zelle 13
description: Superstition is not the order of the day for the 13th case of TKKG. Or is it? For the school newspaper, Gaby interviews an inmate in prison about his everyday life in jail. The prisoner from cell 13, Bodo Heppner, willingly gives information. But Heppner is still silent about what happened to the loot after his bank robbery and whether he had an accomplice. When Gaby visits the bank robber again to give him the freshly printed school newspaper, he suddenly becomes nervous. A short time later he breaks out of prison! And again TKKG is involved in a new case. The clues lead to a horror store, to hard-core crime readers, illiterates and last but not least to an abandoned bunker ...

name: TKKG: Gefährliche Ferien
description: Vacation at last! Camping in Cyprus is the motto, but the four detectives have hardly unrolled their sleeping bag when they get involved in a new case. A picture that at first seems inconspicuous is stolen from a hotel safe. The more TKKG look into the history of the picture, the more people show up who want it desperately. So something is not right with this painting ...

name: TKKG: Verfolgt!
description:
Investigate with TKKG in a new, exciting case that you do not know from the radio plays or books!
Stalked! Gaby feels a shiver down her spine: At the end of a Spanish class at the adult education center, she discovers an anonymous letter between the pages of her book. A stranger who signs "Your faithful prince" seems to be constantly watching her and trying to intimidate her. Tim, Karl, Klößchen and Gaby take up the pursuit of the stranger. The clues soon lead them into the world of the Internet, webcam spying and chat rooms Just when the young detectives think they are on the right track, the case takes a dramatic turn. Will TKKG win the hunt for the "prince" across the city?

name: TKKG: Das Unheimliche Zimmer
description:
Actually, the four friends of TKKG just wanted to go for a bike ride, turn their backs on the city of millions and spend a relaxing weekend in the countryside.
But when they are surprised by a thunderstorm and have to seek shelter in an abandoned hotel, they come across a terrible secret ... And before they know it, they are in the middle of a thrilling criminal case, in which it quickly becomes clear that this is no ordinary case. The clues lead into the past - a past that scares the inhabitants of the small village Oberfeldbach so much that they don't want to talk about it.
Is this case perhaps a bit too big for TKKG?

name: TKKG: Die Feuerprobe
description:
Investigate with TKKG in a new, exciting case that you do not know from the radio plays or books!
In this one, an increasing number of students no longer feel safe at boarding school. What is the truth behind the rumors of blackmail and intimidation at the school? Tim, Karl, Klößchen and Gaby investigate and not only have to deal with a neglected ex-teacher and demonstrating animal rights activists, but also encounter self-appointed "guardian angels" who want to ensure safety in the schoolyard. The good reputation of the school is at stake!
Help TKKG uncover the evil machinations and put a stop to the culprits!

name: Le mur de Berlin va sauter
description: Sin descripción

name: Transformers: Tactical Arena
description: Enter the fray in ranked 1-on-1 card-based realtime arena battles against live opponents, a friend or in unranked AI practice battles. This game features nearly 2 dozen characters from Hasbro’s Transformers amongst nearly 50 playable cards each of which can reach level 8 upgraded by currency earned through wins, with cards and other resources awarded randomly by loot crates for the victor.

name: Stickit
description: Stickit is a brutal first person platforming game about climbing higher and higher to reach your ultimate goal, The Golden Stick. At your disposal is the very simple mechanic of sticking to walls and ceilings, no complex control schemes or wonky physics, so how hard can it be?

name: Nothing Special
description: A short disturbing game about about being held captive by a mysterious girl.

name: Mistigri
description:
This is a bubble-bobblish platformer game for 1 or 2 player.
Mist and Grim must travel through the 22 levels and defeat the overlord.

name: Civil War: The Battle of Bull Run - Take Command 1861
description: Real-time strategy game in which the player commands all or elements of the Union Army of Northeastern Virginia or the Confederate Army of the Potomac or Army of the Shenandoah in a series of historical or speculative scenarios related to the first major land battle of the American Civil War--the First Battle of Bull Run or Manassas.

name: 2048: Sakura Trick Edition
description: An online 2048 game themed around the yuri anime "Sakura Trick".

name: Sonic Unfair
description: Sin descripción

name: Agent Hlina
description: Agent Hlina is an adventure game from 1C. This is one of the first Russian projects where all characters are clay-made. Owing to this technology heroes and characters look very comical and thus the whole picture considerably differs from classically drawn quests. Though clay is a very attractive material, and there is a great tradition of clay-toons in Russia, game developers did not attempt to make a fuss-clay game for a long time. Modeling of clay creatures is a long and hard business, yet it looks quite simple on the face of it...

name: Duvet
description: Duvet is a short adventure-puzzle game made in Unity by Jacaranda Studio about a dystopical world with militarized magical girls.

name: Sufjan Stevens' A Christmas Game
description: An 8bit style adventure game featuring music from Sufjan Stevens' Songs for Christmas album. The game contains several mini-games with 8bit chiptune versions of Sufjan's songs. The better you play, the more presents you'll receive.

name: Marmitta
description: Marmitta is an online multiplayer fishing game in which 1 to 10 players come together to fish and collect flowers in a short amount of time in order to get the most points at the town's beer cauldron.

name: The Dynasty: American Dream
description: Return back home and renovate your entire farm to bring it back to its former glory days. Plants crops and harvest them to either sell them off for currency or utilize them to make other goods. Help out your friends with their farms by visiting them and performing tasks like watering their crops.

name: Dia
description:
Dia is a short free indie horror game.

There is nothing scary ahead.
No sudden noises.
No flashing images.
No one will follow you.
Welcome to Dia.

name: LEGO Star Wars: Castaways
description:
LEGO Star Wars: Castaways with Apple Arcade, a game subscription service with 200+ groundbreaking new games.

Explore a mysterious new planet and meet new friends along the way in LEGO Star Wars: Castaways. By customizing their character, fans can live out their Star Wars fantasies in the first social, action-adventure LEGO Star Wars game, available only on Apple Arcade.

Build your own in-game LEGO minifigure from hundreds of LEGO pieces in a new Star Wars game on Apple Arcade. Discover a secret world, now home to fellow Castaways, and build a life in this new home! Explore a new island, meet new characters, race Microfighters and even throw a dance party on the island! Team up or play solo and immerse yourself in simulations, recorded by the technology of an ancient civilization, spanning moments across the Star Wars universe. Battle foes, solve puzzles, build your skills in battle arenas and learn to pilot your way through flight simulations! Unearth mysteries and discover a growing threat to life on the planet.

Join the ranks of Castaways and write your Star Wars destiny in a new, never-before-seen LEGO Star Wars adventure!

name: Masked Wolf: Astronaut Tiles Hop Beat
description: Masked Wolf - Astronaut Tiles Hop Beat is an unlicensed rhythm game for Android devices. The game is a Tiles Hop clone based around the Australian rap artist Masked Wolf, with the main focus of the game being centered around his song "Astronaut in the Ocean", which has been his most successful release.

name: Wangan Trial
description: Racing game for the Sony Playstation published by Victor Interactive Software only in Japan in 1998.

name: Polyrhythm Mania
description: A game that faithfully recreates the Polyrhythm minigame from Rhythm Tengoku (リズム天国), with a built-in level editor and side modes.

name: Asura's Wrath: Lost Episode 1
description: One of the world's greatest warriors appears before Asura... His name is Ryu. He challenges Asura to a duel and they exchange punches in an intense battle. Ryu is then suddenly consumed by the Satsui no Hado...

name: Asura's Wrath: Lost Episode 2
description: After his battle with Ryu, Asura is confronted by Akuma, the fighter who seeks to surpass all.

name: Granny's House
description: In a certain town, a strange rumor is spreading about a crazed granny who kidnaps children. The children are locked in Granny's House. Will they be able to escape from the mad mansion without getting caught? Play a hair-raising 8-player game of tag right now!

name: The Magic Land
description: The Magic Land is a massive online role-playing game where people live in a magical world of adventures, In an MMORPG people from all over the world meet on a virtual playground to explore areas, solve tricky riddles and undertake heroic exploits. Players are faced with the challenge of developing the skills of their selected characters, exploring a large variety of areas and dangerous dungeons and interacting with other players on a social and diplomatic level.

name: Fooaaahh!
description: You're flying your airplane carrying a huge load of honey, when suddenly your plane explodes! As you fall, avoid birds and airplane parts while trying to hit flying globs of honey to slow down.

name: Deathball
description:
DeathBall is a top class First Person Sport Game that combines elements of Football, Rugby and Handball. It's a mod for UT2004, but it has nothing to do with a shooter (a pure sports game).

So you got these football pitches, and you have to get the ball into the enemy goal. You have a hammer tool. With that one you can kick other players around, kill the enemy ballowner with 2 hits and also kick the ball away (volley).
In your own penalty zone you can kill all enemy players with one hit. With the ball launcher you can charge up a shot, the longer you hold it the harder it will be and you can even add spin to the ball, so it will curl in the air.
Just like in football you should have a keeper in your goal. He has some special abilities like he's 30% faster than others,he can dodge and jump higher.
Death Ball should be played with 6-10 players
The gameplay is very easy too learn, but it's hard to master. At first it seems to be pretty simple, but the more you play the more you realise how complex it is and how many possibilities your team has. The ways to score are infinite.

name: Shades of Manhattan 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Evacuation
description: Evacuation is a puzzle game where you try to rescue as many astronauts, so without letting them in a room with aliens or into outerspace. You do this by clicking on the colored doors, on which all doors of the corresponding color also open or close.

name: Winner vs. Loser
description: Sin descripción

name: Fairy Bakery Workshop
description:
Be a full-fledged bakery owner
You can experience everything from harvesting wheat in the field to renovating the store.
A free simulation game to create a cute bakery!

name: Tsuki Adventure
description:
Join Tsuki in an awe-inspiring adventure and discover all the beauty that country life has to offer.
Journey to the beautiful countryside of Japan and explore a peaceful world

name: Enenra
description: Enenra is a third person, hack and slash game which takes place in future Japan with a heavy emphasis on time manipulation abilities.

name: Unoklive vs. Zuck
description:
UnOk's twitch account was terminated!

UnOk will have to go to Twitch HQ and find out who is banning everyone.,

but not without some people in the way...

UnOkLive Vs Zuck is a 2D singleplayer bullet-hell game with tons of bosses and levels that shoots bullets. You are UnOk and you have to get to Twitch HQ to unban your twitch account.

name: .Hack//G.U. Vol. 1: Rebirth HD
description: .Hack//G.U. simulates a massively multiplayer online role-playing game; players assume the role of a participant in a fictional game called The World. While in The World, the player controls the on-screen player character, Haseo, from a third-person person perspective (with optional first-person mode). The player may control the camera using the game controller's right analog stick.

name: .Hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption HD
description: .Hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption is the third entry in the .hack//G.U. series containing: Vol. 1: Rebirth, .hack//G.U. Vol. 2: Reminisce and .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption. As in the previous .hack games, .hack//G.U. simulates a massively multiplayer online role-playing game as the player controls a character who starts playing it. Players assume the role of a participant in a fictional game called The World. While in The World, the player controls the on-screen player character, Haseo, from a third-person person perspective (with optional first-person mode). The player may control the camera using the game controller's right analog stick.

name: .Hack//G.U. Vol. 2: Reminisce HD
description: .Hack//G.U. Vol. 2: Reminisce is the second entry in the .hack//G.U. series containing: Vol. 1: Rebirth, .hack//G.U. Vol. 2: Reminisce and .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption. As in the previous .hack games, .hack//G.U. simulates a massively multiplayer online role-playing game as the player controls a character who starts playing it. Players assume the role of a participant in a fictional game called The World. While in The World, the player controls the on-screen player character, Haseo, from a third-person person perspective (with optional first-person mode). The player may control the camera using the game controller's right analog stick.

name: Nodrog's Fortress
description: Nodrog's Fortress is a Tactics-like Turn-Based All at Once Battler that features elements of Chess and American Football in a JRPG inspired package. Choose your Archmage, companions to fight for them, and try your hand in the 9 Story Missions, Local Pass and Play, PVP Online or in Survival mode, where there is no true Victory...

name: Kirakira Monstars
description: It's sure to bring a smile to everyone's face! In the big city of the human world, a group of monstrous girls go about their daily lives in a serious, anything-goes, slapstick frenzy!

name: Danganronpa Forge:Re
